name: Powerpuff
summary_text: Three disillusioned women in their 20s with superpowers who used to fight crime together and now resent having lost their childhood to that are faced with the choice of reuniting now that the world needs them more than ever.

name: You're Next
summary_text: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

name: High Fidelity
summary_text: A fan of music, pop culture and Top Five lists runs a local record store in her hometown. An adaptation of Nick Hornby's novel "High Fidelity".

name: Gangs of Wasseypur
summary_text: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

name: Redemption
summary_text: A damaged ex-special forces soldier navigating London's criminal underworld seizes an opportunity to assume another man's identity.

name: Covert Affairs
summary_text: Fresh out of the farm, Annie Walker must adapt to the challenging life of a CIA operative under the guidance of her handler, Auggie. But soon she realizes her recruit might have to do with her last boyfriend rather than her talent.

name: Cinderella Man
summary_text: The story of James J. Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to challenge for the heavyweight championship of the world.

name: Fitzcarraldo
summary_text: The story of Brian Sweeney Fitzgerald, an extremely determined man who intends to build an opera house in the middle of a jungle.

name: Cleopatra
summary_text: Queen Cleopatra VII of Egypt experiences both triumph and tragedy as she attempts to resist the imperial ambitions of Rome.

name: Queen of the Damned
summary_text: In this loose sequel to Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles (1994), the vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the equally beautiful and monstrous queen of all vampires.

name: The Woman in White
summary_text: A young painter stumbles upon an assortment of odd characters at an English estate where he has been hired to give art lessons to beautiful Laura Fairlie. Among them are Anne Catherick, a ...                See full summary »

name: Fresh Meat
summary_text: A comedy that follows a group of six students about to embark on the most exciting period of their lives so far, university.

name: The Jungle Book
summary_text: Bagheera the Panther and Baloo the Bear have a difficult time trying to convince a boy to leave the jungle for human civilization.

name: Primal
summary_text: A caveman and a dinosaur bond over shared tragedy and work together to survive in a perilous prehistoric world.

name: Logan's Run
summary_text: A police officer in the future uncovers the deadly secret behind a society that worships youth.

name: Vongozero: The Outbreak
summary_text: A terrible plague strikes and a group decides to risk their lives. Humanity struggles to survive as they face the end of their civilization.

name: Within
summary_text: A thriller centered around a widower who moves into a seemingly perfect new home with his daughter and new wife.

name: Despicable Me 3
summary_text: Gru meets his long-lost, charming, cheerful, and more successful twin brother Dru, who wants to team up with him for one last criminal heist.

name: Arachnophobia
summary_text: A species of South American killer spider hitches a lift to the U.S. in a coffin and starts to breed and kill.

name: 30 Days of Night
summary_text: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.

name: Spartacus: Gods of the Arena
summary_text: In the time before the arrival of Spartacus, the House of Batiatus faces many challenges from competitors, and within its own household.

name: Red Dwarf
summary_text: The adventures of the last human alive and his friends, stranded three million years into deep space on the mining ship Red Dwarf.

name: Pink Flamingos
summary_text: Notorious Baltimore criminal and underground figure Divine goes up against a sleazy married couple who make a passionate attempt to humiliate her and seize her tabloid-given title as "The Filthiest Person Alive".

name: Spartacus
summary_text: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.

name: Blast from the Past
summary_text: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

name: The Seventh Seal
summary_text: A man seeks answers about life, death, and the existence of God as he plays chess against the Grim Reaper during the Black Plague.

name: Scanners
summary_text: A scientist sends a man with extraordinary psychic powers to hunt others like him.

name: Mass Effect 3
summary_text: Earth is under attack by a monstrous race of gigantic living ships known as the Reapers. Even if Commander Shepard could unite all surviving species in the galaxy, only a miracle could save them. Then again, Shepard did come back from the dead.

name: Save Me
summary_text: Nelly hasn't rested trying to find his missing daughter Jody, he won't give up, and he will do anything to find out what happened. Discovering things about him and those around him, things he never imagined.

name: Selena
summary_text: The true story of Selena, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.

name: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime
summary_text: Lonely thirty-seven-year-old Mikami Satoru is stuck in a dead-end job, unhappy with his mundane life, but after dying at the hands of a robber, he awakens to a fresh start in a fantasy ...                See full summary »

name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
summary_text: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

name: The Suite Life of Zack & Cody
summary_text: Comedy about identical twins living at the Tipton Hotel with their single mother who is a lounge singer at the hotel.

name: Let Me In
summary_text: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.

name: Funny Games
summary_text: Two psychopathic young men take a family hostage in their cabin.

name: Heavyweights
summary_text: Plump kids are lured into joining a posh fat camp with the promise of quick weight loss and good times, only to find that the facility is a woodland hellhole run by a psycho ex-fitness instructor.

name: Coach
summary_text: Hayden Fox is the head coach of a university football team, and eats, sleeps and lives football.

name: Blade II
summary_text: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

name: Witness
summary_text: When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

name: The Spy Who Dumped Me
summary_text: Audrey and Morgan are best friends who unwittingly become entangled in an international conspiracy when one of the women discovers the boyfriend who dumped her was actually a spy.

name: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: A substance designed to help the brain repair itself gives advanced intelligence to a chimpanzee who leads an ape uprising.

name: King Kong
summary_text: A film crew goes to a tropical island for an exotic location shoot and discovers a colossal ape who takes a shine to their female blonde star. He is then captured and brought back to New York City for public exhibition.

name: Shrek Forever After
summary_text: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpelstiltskin rules supreme.

name: Agatha Raisin
summary_text: The Cotswolds-based PR guru turned amateur sleuth returns for a series of comedic murder-mysteries based on the books by M.C. Beaton.

name: Deliver Us from Evil
summary_text: An assassin goes to Thailand in order to solve a kidnapping case linked to him, and finds himself chased by a man whose sibling he killed.

name: Fallen Angels
summary_text: This Hong Kong-set crime drama follows the lives of a hitman, hoping to get out of the business, and his elusive female partner.

name: The Ten Commandments
summary_text: Moses, an Egyptian Prince, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people.

name: The Happiest Millionaire
summary_text: Clever yet hapless new butler John Lawless manages a Philadelphia household for quirky and joyful millionaire Anthony Drexel Biddle, his unflappable wife, Cordelia, and their spitfire daughter, Cordy.

name: Deadliest Catch
summary_text: A documentary series chronicling the real-life high-sea adventures of the Alaskan crab fishermen. This is the most deadly profession in the world.

name: The Moodys
summary_text: Dan Moody returns home to spend Christmas with his dysfunctional family.

name: Lonesome Dove
summary_text: Two former Texas Rangers renew their spirit of adventure as they and several other residents of a small Texas town join a cattle drive to the Montana Territory.

name: Baht Zamani
summary_text: Once you have believed that your fortune turned its back, it is not easy to overcome bad luck. But Ada, who has grown up among women who believe that they will be happy if they marry the ...                See full summary »

name: Wild Wild West
summary_text: The two best special agents in the Wild West must save President Grant from the clutches of a diabolical, wheelchair-bound, steampunk-savvy, Confederate scientist bent on revenge for losing the Civil War.

name: The Hand That Rocks the Cradle
summary_text: After her humiliated husband kills himself, an embittered pregnant widow loses her child, and embarks on a mission of vengeance against a woman and her family.

name: Industry
summary_text: Young bankers and traders make their way in the financial world in the aftermath of the 2008 collapse.

name: Inside Llewyn Davis
summary_text: A week in the life of a young singer as he navigates the Greenwich Village folk scene of 1961.

name: Silk Road
summary_text: Philosophical twenty-something Ross Ulbricht creates Silk Road, a dark net website that sells drugs, while DEA agent Rick Bowden goes undercover to bring him down.

name: Jungle
summary_text: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village. The men soon realize that the jungle is a difficult place to be.

name: Nashville
summary_text: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.

name: The Slumberparty Massacre
summary_text: A female high school student's slumber party turns into a bloodbath, as a newly escaped psychotic serial killer wielding a power drill prowls her neighborhood.

name: Body of Lies
summary_text: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordan Intelligence.

name: The Magician
summary_text: A mockumentary that follows Ray Shoesmith, a Melbourne hitman who is simultaneously ruthless and caring, likeable and volatile. 'Filmed' by his media student neighbour for a university ...                See full summary »

name: Night of the Living Dead
summary_text: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the East Coast of the United States.

name: Destroyer
summary_text: A police detective reconnects with people from an undercover assignment in her distant past in order to make peace.

name: Mike and Dave Need Wedding Dates
summary_text: Two hard-partying brothers place an online ad to find the perfect dates for their sister's Hawaiian wedding. Hoping for a wild getaway, the boys instead find themselves out-hustled by an uncontrollable duo.

name: The Lucky One
summary_text: A Marine travels to Louisiana after serving three tours in Iraq and searches for the unknown woman he believes was his good luck charm during the war.

name: Burden of Truth
summary_text: Big city lawyer Joanna Hanley returns to her hometown to take the case of a group of girls suffering from a mysterious illness.

name: Journey to the Center of the Earth
summary_text: On a quest to find out what happened to his missing brother, a scientist, his nephew and their mountain guide discover a fantastic and dangerous lost world in the center of the earth.

name: Short Circuit
summary_text: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

name: One Chance
summary_text: The true story of Paul Potts, a shy, bullied shop assistant by day and an amateur opera singer by night who became a phenomenon after being chosen for -- and ultimately winning -- Britain's Got Talent (2007).

name: Fear Street Part Two: 1978
summary_text: Shadyside, 1978. School's out for summer and the activities at Camp Nightwing are about to begin. But when another Shadysider is possessed with the urge to kill, the fun in the sun becomes a gruesome fight for survival.

name: The Challenge
summary_text: Past members of "The Real World," "Road Rules," "Are You the One?," first time cast members called 'Fresh Meat,' relatives of these members, and past members from other shows compete against each other for the chance to win a cash prize.

name: Greek
summary_text: Freshman Rusty Cartwright arrives at college and decides he no longer wants to be the boring geek from high school. He decides to pledge a fraternity. He is offered 2 bids; one from his sister's boyfriend Evan's fraternity and one from Cappie, his sister's ex-boyfriend's fraternity. Rusty must learn to handle his new life, and his new relationship with his sister. His sister must decide if she ...                See full summary »

name: Chocolat
summary_text: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.

name: Monday
summary_text: A spark on a Friday can lead to a sizzling weekend fling, but what happens when you get to the inevitable Monday?

name: Better Things
summary_text: An actress raises her three daughters while juggling the pressures of working in Hollywood and being a single parent.

name: Eoneu Nal Uri Jib Hyeongwaeuro Myeolmangyi Deuleowassda
summary_text: Tak Dong Kyung lives a fairly ordinary life until she stumbles into an unexpected fate and ends up signing a hundred-day contract with Myul Mang, risking her everything.

name: Ghost World
summary_text: With only the plan of moving in together after high school, two unusually devious friends seek direction in life. As a mere gag, they respond to a man's newspaper ad for a date, only to find it will greatly complicate their lives.

name: Babel
summary_text: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

name: Death Race
summary_text: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

name: Dumb and Dumber To
summary_text: 20 years since their first adventure, Lloyd and Harry go on a road trip to find Harry's newly discovered daughter, who was given up for adoption.

name: Metropolis
summary_text: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

name: Rescue Me
summary_text: Tommy Gavin deals with the fears of his job as a firefighter and seeing his ex-wife dating other men.

name: The Broken Hearts Gallery
summary_text: After a break-up, a young woman decides to start a gallery where people can leave trinkets from past relationships.

name: Shark Tale
summary_text: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

name: Rust Creek
summary_text: An overachieving college student gets lost on her way to a job interview. A wrong turn leaves her stranded deep in the Kentucky forest.

name: Equilibrium
summary_text: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

name: Introspectum Motel
summary_text: Two strangers, Philippe and Paul head down a dark and twisted path inside themselves, as they uncover the connection between them. Together, they are forced to confront their choices, their shared history, and ultimately their humanity.

name: Loving
summary_text: The story of Richard and Mildred Loving, a couple whose arrest for interracial marriage in 1960s Virginia began a legal battle that would end with the Supreme Court's historic 1967 decision.

name: What/If
summary_text: An anthology series which tackles a different morality tale, and the ripple effect of a single decision that changes the trajectory of an entire life.

name: The Expendables 2
summary_text: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

name: Sorry for Your Loss
summary_text: Her husband's sudden death upends and transforms relationships in Leigh Shaw's life and also forces her to realize how much she didn't know about him.

name: Four Brothers
summary_text: When their adoptive mother is gunned down in a store robbery the 'four brothers' investigate the murder for themselves & look for the killers, but not all is what it seems.

name: The Stepfather
summary_text: After murdering his entire family, a man marries a widow with a teenage daughter in another town and prepares to do it all over again.

name: The Other Boleyn Girl
summary_text: Two sisters contend for the affection of King Henry VIII.

name: Eat Pray Love
summary_text: A married woman realizes how unhappy her marriage really is, and that her life needs to go in a different direction. After a painful divorce, she takes off on a round-the-world journey to "find herself".

name: Total Recall
summary_text: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.

name: Dark Angel
summary_text: A group of genetically-enhanced children escape from a lab project. Years later we meet Max, one of the escapees who now works for a messenger service in the post-apocalyptic Pacific Northwest.

name: Near Dark
summary_text: A small-town farmer's son reluctantly joins a traveling group of vampires after he is bitten by a beautiful drifter.

name: Entourage
summary_text: Movie star Vincent Chase, together with his boys Eric, Turtle, and Johnny, are back - and back in business with super agent-turned-studio head Ari Gold on a risky project that will serve as Vince's directorial debut.

name: The Haves and the Have Nots
summary_text: Centers on the rich Cryer and Harrington families (the haves) and the poor Young family (the have nots) whose lives intertwine when Hanna Young starts working for the Cryers.

name: In Plain Sight
summary_text: U.S. Marshal Mary Shannon must hunt down witnesses for federal cases in the witness protection program while also managing a rather dysfunctional family and her own personal life.

name: Cargo
summary_text: After an epidemic spreads all over Australia, a father searches for someone willing to protect his daughter.

name: Countdown
summary_text: When a nurse downloads an app that claims to predict the moment a person will die, it tells her she only has three days to live. With the clock ticking and a figure haunting her, she must find a way to save her life before time runs out.

name: Raising Arizona
summary_text: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

name: Black Snake Moan
summary_text: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.

name: The Boy with Green Hair
summary_text: This parable looks at public reaction when the hair of an American war orphan mysteriously turns green.

name: The Iron Giant
summary_text: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

name: The Other Woman
summary_text: After discovering her boyfriend is married, Carly soon meets the wife he's been betraying. And when yet another love affair is discovered, all three women team up to plot revenge on the three-timing S.O.B.

name: Garden State
summary_text: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.

name: The Damned
summary_text: The dramatic collapse of a wealthy, industrialist/Junker family during the reign of the Third Reich.

name: The Assistant
summary_text: A searing look at a day in the life of an assistant to a powerful executive. As Jane follows her daily routine, she grows increasingly aware of the insidious abuse that threatens every aspect of her position.

name: Pride
summary_text: U.K. gay activists work to help miners during their lengthy strike of the National Union of Mineworkers in the summer of 1984.

name: True Beauty
summary_text: After being bullied and discriminated because of her ugly looks, a high school girl transforms herself into a gorgeous "goddess" and quickly rises to fame after mastering the art of makeup via online tutorial videos.

name: Buffalo '66
summary_text: After being released from prison, Billy is set to visit his parents with his wife, whom he does not actually have. This provokes Billy to act out, as he kidnaps a girl and forces her to act as his wife for the visit.

name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed
summary_text: The Mystery Inc. gang must save Coolsville from an attack of their past monsters brought to life by an evil masked figure trying to take down the gang.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
summary_text: The Turtles get into another battle with their enemy the Shredder, who has acquired new allies: the mutant thugs Bebop and Rocksteady and the alien being Krang.

name: The 5th Wave
summary_text: Four waves of increasingly deadly alien attacks have left most of Earth in ruin. Cassie is on the run, desperately trying to save her younger brother.

name: Shirley
summary_text: A famous horror writer finds inspiration for her next book after she and her husband take in a young couple.

name: The Penthouse: War in Life
summary_text: The story of a woman who strives to achieve her goal of entering high society by becoming the "queen" in the 100th floor penthouse in Gangnam, the pinnacle of success in her eyes.

name: L.A. Law
summary_text: The lives and work of the staff of a major Los Angeles law firm.

name: Wallander
summary_text: A television show centered on a soul-searching Swedish cop.

name: Gentleman Jack
summary_text: A dramatization of the life of LGBTQ+ trailblazer, voracious learner, and cryptic diarist Anne Lister, who returns to Halifax, West Yorkshire in 1832, determined to transform the fate of her faded ancestral home Shibden Hall.

name: Central Intelligence
summary_text: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

name: Party Down
summary_text: A group of actors move to Los Angeles to make it big, but end up working as caterers.

name: The Lorax
summary_text: A 12-year-old boy searches for the one thing that will enable him to win the affection of the girl of his dreams. To find it he must discover the story of the Lorax, the grumpy yet charming creature who fights to protect his world.

name: Punch-Drunk Love
summary_text: A frustrated Barry Egan calls a phone-sex line to curb his loneliness. Little does he know that he will land in huge trouble and will also jeopardise his relationship with Lena.

name: Valkyrie
summary_text: A dramatization of the July 20, 1944 assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Adolf Hitler during World War II.

name: 'Allo 'Allo!
summary_text: In France during World War II, Rene Artois runs a small café where Resistance fighters, Gestapo men, German Army officers and escaped Allied POWs interact daily, ignorant of one another's true identity or presence, exasperating Rene.

name: Teen Titans
summary_text: A team of five teenaged superheroes save the world from many villains around their city while experiencing things normal teens face today.

name: Knight of Cups
summary_text: A writer indulging in all that Los Angeles and Las Vegas has to offer undertakes a search for love and self via a series of adventures with six different women.

name: Tidelands
summary_text: After an ex-con returns to her fishing village, a dead body leads her to uncover the secrets of the town and its half-siren, half-human residents.

name: Sputnik
summary_text: The lone survivor of an enigmatic spaceship incident hasn't returned back home alone-hiding inside his body is a dangerous creature.

name: Addams Family Values
summary_text: The Addams Family try to rescue their beloved Uncle Fester from his gold-digging new love, a black widow named Debbie.

name: Bo Burnham: Make Happy
summary_text: Bo Burnham tackles life, death, sexuality, hypocrisy, mental illness and Pringles cans in his dazzling new stand-up special.

name: The Girl in the Spider's Web
summary_text: Young computer hacker Lisbeth Salander and journalist Mikael Blomkvist find themselves caught in a web of spies, cybercriminals and corrupt government officials.

name: Death and Nightingales
summary_text: An epic tale of love, betrayal, deception, and revenge set in the Irish countryside in 1885.

name: Romance
summary_text: Frustrated by the lack of intimacy in her relationship, a young schoolteacher goes through a series of intimidating and often violent sexual partners.

name: Pet Sematary
summary_text: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.

name: Charlie Wilson's War
summary_text: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.

name: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
summary_text: A growing nation of genetically evolved apes led by Caesar is threatened by a band of human survivors of the devastating virus unleashed a decade earlier.

name: All Creatures Great and Small
summary_text: The trials and misadventures of the staff of a country veterinary office in Yorkshire from the 1930s to the 1950s.

name: Rio Bravo
summary_text: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

name: Inheritance
summary_text: The patriarch of a wealthy and powerful family suddenly passes away, leaving his daughter with a shocking secret inheritance that threatens to unravel and destroy the family.

name: The Kitchen
summary_text: The wives of New York gangsters in Hell's Kitchen in the 1970s continue to operate their husbands' rackets after they're locked up in prison.

name: Concrete Cowboy
summary_text: Sent to live with his estranged father for the summer, a rebellious teen finds kinship in a tight-knit Philadelphia community of Black cowboys.

name: The Edge of All We Know
summary_text: A documentary film following the quest to understand the most mysterious objects in the universe, black holes.

name: The War of the Roses
summary_text: A married couple try everything to get each other to leave the house in a vicious divorce battle.

name: Lagaan: Once Upon a Time in India
summary_text: The people of a small village in Victorian India stake their future on a game of cricket against their ruthless British rulers.

name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
summary_text: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang
summary_text: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.

name: Hot in Cleveland
summary_text: Three 40-something best friends from Los Angeles are flying to Paris when their plane makes an emergency landing in Cleveland. Realizing that all the norms from Los Angeles don't apply anymore, they decide to celebrate a city that values real women and stay where they're still considered hot.

name: Killing Me Softly
summary_text: A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.

name: Blood & Treasure
summary_text: An antiquities expert teams up with an art thief to catch a terrorist who funds his attacks using stolen artifacts.

name: Official Secrets
summary_text: The true story of a British whistleblower who leaked information to the press about an illegal NSA spy operation designed to push the UN Security Council into sanctioning the 2003 invasion of Iraq.

name: Step Up 2: The Streets
summary_text: Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.

name: Young & Hungry
summary_text: A well-off young tech entrepreneur hires a feisty young food blogger to be his personal chef.

name: Kelly's Heroes
summary_text: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

name: Everybody's Fine
summary_text: A widower who realized his only connection to his family was through his wife sets off on an impromptu road trip to reunite with each of his grown children.

name: White Men Can't Jump
summary_text: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances of winning money on the street courts and in a basketball tournament.

name: Call Me Kat
summary_text: A 39-year-old woman decides to use the money her parents had been saving for her wedding to open a cat-themed cafe.

name: The Time Traveler's Wife
summary_text: A Chicago librarian has a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, creating complications in his marriage.

name: Burnt
summary_text: Adam Jones is a chef who destroyed his career with drugs and diva behavior. He cleans up and returns to London, determined to redeem himself by spearheading a top restaurant that can gain three Michelin stars.

name: The Protector
summary_text: Discovering his ties to a secret ancient order, a young man living in modern Istanbul embarks on a quest to save the city from an immortal enemy.

name: Wrath of the Titans
summary_text: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.

name: The Grudge
summary_text: A house is cursed by a vengeful ghost that dooms those who enter it with a violent death.

name: Bad Luck Banging or Loony Porn
summary_text: Emi, a school teacher, finds her career and reputation under threat after a personal sex tape is leaked on the Internet. Forced to meet the parents demanding her dismissal, Emi refuses to surrender to their pressure.

name: Can't Buy Me Love
summary_text: An outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to pretend to be his girlfriend for a month.

name: Echo Boomers
summary_text: Based on a true story, five college graduates decide the best way to get back at the unfair economy and live the life they've always wanted is to steal from Chicago's richest and give to themselves.

name: We Have Always Lived in the Castle
summary_text: Merricat, Constance and their Uncle Julian live in isolation after experiencing a family tragedy six years earlier. When cousin Charles arrives to steal the family fortune, he also threatens a dark secret they've been hiding.

name: Fear of Rain
summary_text: A girl living with schizophrenia struggles with terrifying hallucinations as she begins to suspect her neighbor has kidnapped a child. The only person who believes her is Caleb -a boy she isn't even sure exists.

name: Eagle Eye
summary_text: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.

name: Martha Marcy May Marlene
summary_text: Haunted by painful memories and increasing paranoia, a damaged woman struggles to re-assimilate with her family after fleeing an abusive cult.

name: A Perfect World
summary_text: Kidnapped boy Phillip Perry (T.J. Lowther) strikes up a friendship with his captor Butch Haynes (Kevin Costner): an escaped convict on the run from the law, while the search is headed up by honorable Texas Ranger "Red" Garrett (Clint Eastwood).

name: The Illusionist
summary_text: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

name: Untitled Paul Thomas Anderson Project
summary_text: Set in 1970s San Fernando Valley, the film follows a high school student, who is also a successful child actor.

name: Playing with Fire
summary_text: A crew of rugged firefighters meet their match when attempting to rescue three rambunctious kids.

name: Halo
summary_text: Aliens threaten human existence in an epic 26th-century showdown. TV series based on the video game 'Halo'.

name: The Prom
summary_text: A troupe of hilariously self-obsessed theater stars swarm into a small conservative Indiana town in support of a high school girl who wants to take her girlfriend to the prom.

name: Meet the Robinsons
summary_text: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.

name: Pather Panchali
summary_text: Impoverished priest Harihar Ray, dreaming of a better life for himself and his family, leaves his rural Bengal village in search of work.

name: Foxcatcher
summary_text: U.S. Olympic wrestling champions and brothers Mark Schultz and Dave Schultz join "Team Foxcatcher", led by eccentric multi-millionaire John du Pont, as they train for the 1988 Olympic Games in Seoul, South Korea, but John's self-destructive behavior threatens to consume them all.

name: Assassination Classroom
summary_text: A powerful creature claims that within a year, Earth will be destroyed by him, but he offers mankind a chance by becoming a homeroom teacher where he teaches his students about how to kill him. An assassination classroom begins.

name: Flags of Our Fathers
summary_text: The life stories of the six men who raised the flag at the Battle of Iwo Jima, a turning point in World War II.

name: Journey 2: The Mysterious Island
summary_text: Sean Anderson partners with his mom's husband on a mission to find his grandfather, who is thought to be missing on a mythical island.

name: Ip Man 4: The Finale
summary_text: The Kung Fu master travels to the U.S. where his student has upset the local martial arts community by opening a Wing Chun school.

name: A Week Away
summary_text: With nowhere left to go, Will Hawkins finds himself at camp for the first time. His instinct is to run, but he finds a friend, a father figure, and even a girl who awakens his heart. Most of all, he finally finds a home.

name: The Mechanic
summary_text: An elite hitman teaches his trade to an apprentice who has a connection to one of his previous victims.

name: Z for Zachariah
summary_text: In the wake of a disaster that wipes out most of civilization, two men and a young woman find themselves in an emotionally charged love triangle as the last known survivors.

name: Let the Right One In
summary_text: Oskar, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Eli, a beautiful but peculiar girl.

name: Seance
summary_text: Camille, a young woman who arrives at the Fairfield Academy following one of the student's untimely and violent death.

name: Oculus
summary_text: A woman tries to exonerate her brother, who was convicted of murder, by proving that the crime was committed by a supernatural phenomenon.

name: Lost Girls
summary_text: When Mari Gilbert's daughter disappears, police inaction drives her own investigation into the gated Long Island community where Shannan was last seen. Her search brings attention to over a dozen murdered sex workers.

name: The Color Purple
summary_text: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

name: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor
summary_text: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.

name: Ben-Hur
summary_text: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.

name: Someone Great
summary_text: After a devastating break up on the eve of her cross-country move, Jenny enjoys one last NYC adventure with her two best pals. Someone Great is a romantic comedy about love, loss, growth and the everlasting bond of female friendship.

name: Child's Play
summary_text: A mother gives her 13-year-old son a toy doll for his birthday, unaware of its more sinister nature.

name: Elf
summary_text: Raised as an over-sized elf, a human travels from the North Pole to NYC to meet his biological father who doesn't know he exists and is in desperate need of some Christmas spirit.

name: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
summary_text: On the planet Eternia, a young prince gains the ability to become a powerful warrior to defend Castle Grayskull against the dark lord Skeletor.

name: Awakenings
summary_text: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

name: Stick It
summary_text: After a run-in with the law, Haley Graham (Missy Peregrym) is forced to return to the world from which she fled some years ago. Enrolled in an elite gymnastics program run by the legendary Burt Vickerman (Jeff Bridges), Haley's rebellious attitude gives way to something that just might be called team spirit.

name: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life
summary_text: Adventurer Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box, before an evil scientist finds it, and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.

name: Dirty Grandpa
summary_text: Right before his wedding, an uptight guy is tricked into driving his grandfather, a lecherous former Army Lieutenant Colonel, to Florida for Spring Break.

name: Pushing Daisies
summary_text: A pastry chef with the power to bring dead people back to life solves murder mysteries with his resurrected childhood sweetheart, a cynical private investigator, and a lovesick waitress.

name: Rush
summary_text: Doctor William Rush is not your average on-call professional. He's not attached to any hospital, he's highly discreet -- no matter the ailment, his clients must pay a cash-only premium, and the doctor can party with the best of them.

name: Black Mass
summary_text: The true story of Whitey Bulger, the brother of a state senator and the most infamous violent criminal in the history of South Boston, who became an FBI informant to take down a Mafia family invading his turf.

name: Save the Last Dance
summary_text: A white midwestern girl moves to Chicago, where her new boyfriend is a black teen from the South Side with a rough, semi-criminal past.

name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
summary_text: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

name: Critters
summary_text: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

name: Mrs. America
summary_text: Conservative activist Phyllis Schlafly leads an unexpected fight against the Equal Rights Amendment movement during the 1970s.

name: Splash
summary_text: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

name: TVF Pitchers
summary_text: A story of trials and tribulations of four young entrepreneurs who quit their day jobs in order to pursue their start up venture.

name: Evil Dead II
summary_text: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

name: Body Double
summary_text: A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.

name: Two Weeks Notice
summary_text: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.

name: Side Effects
summary_text: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.

name: Feral State
summary_text: A misfit gang of runaways and orphans are taken in by a dark and charismatic father figure who together wreak havoc throughout swamps and trailer parks of central Florida.

name: Dreamgirls
summary_text: A trio of black female soul singers cross over to the pop charts in the early 1960s, facing their own personal struggles along the way.

name: Assassination Nation
summary_text: After a malicious data hack exposes the secrets of the perpetually American town of Salem, chaos descends and four girls must fight to survive, while coping with the hack themselves.

name: Top Secret!
summary_text: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

name: The Wraith
summary_text: After a young man is murdered by a road-racing gang of motor-heads, a mysterious fast-driving spirit descends from the sky to take revenge.

name: Rocky III
summary_text: After winning the ultimate title and being the world champion, Rocky falls into a hole and finds himself picked up by a former enemy.

name: How to Train Your Dragon 2
summary_text: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.

name: The Three Musketeers
summary_text: France, 1625: Young d'Artagnan heads to Paris to join the Musketeers but the evil cardinal has disbanded them - save 3. He meets the 3, Athos, Porthos and Aramis, and joins them on their quest to save the king and country.

name: Nathan for You
summary_text: Nathan Fielder uses his business degree and life experiences to help real small businesses turn a profit. But because of his unorthodox approach, Nathan's genuine efforts to do good often draw real people into an experience far beyond what they signed up for.

name: Blood Simple
summary_text: The owner of a seedy small-town Texas bar discovers that one of his employees is having an affair with his wife. A chaotic chain of misunderstandings, lies and mischief ensues after he devises a plot to have them murdered.

name: Swiss Army Man
summary_text: A hopeless man stranded on a deserted island befriends a dead body, and together they go on a surreal journey to get home.

name: Goldfinger
summary_text: While investigating a gold magnate's smuggling, James Bond uncovers a plot to contaminate the Fort Knox gold reserve.

name: Scream 2
summary_text: Two years after the first series of murders, as Sidney acclimates to college life, someone donning the Ghostface costume begins a new string of killings.

name: Small Soldiers
summary_text: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

name: Ferdinand
summary_text: After Ferdinand, a bull with a big heart, is mistaken for a dangerous beast, he is captured and torn from his home. Determined to return to his family, he rallies a misfit team on the ultimate adventure.

name: The Book of Boba Fett
summary_text: The spin-off of "The Mandalorian" will star Temeura Morrison as Boba Fett and Ming-Na Wen as Fennec Shand.

name: Texas Chainsaw
summary_text: A young woman travels to Texas to collect an inheritance; little does she know that an encounter with a chainsaw-wielding killer is part of the reward.

name: Collateral
summary_text: London detectives investigating the seemingly random murder of a pizza delivery man uncover a convoluted case of interlocking circumstances amid a cross-section of British society.

name: The Lone Ranger
summary_text: Native American warrior Tonto recounts the untold tales that transformed John Reid, a man of the law, into a legend of justice.

name: The Fountain
summary_text: As a modern-day scientist, Tommy is struggling with mortality, desperately searching for the medical breakthrough that will save the life of his cancer-stricken wife, Izzi.

name: Alias Grace
summary_text: In 19th-century Canada, a psychiatrist weighs whether a murderess should be pardoned due to insanity.

name: Lethal Weapon 2
summary_text: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

name: The Paper Tigers
summary_text: Three Kung Fu prodigies have grown into washed-up, middle-aged men, now one kick away from pulling their hamstrings. But when their master is murdered, they must juggle their dead-end jobs, dad duties, and old grudges to avenge his death.

name: Josee, the Tiger and the Fish
summary_text: Tsuneo is a university student and Josee is a young girl who has rarely gone out of the house by herself due to her being unable to walk. The two meet when Tsuneo finds Josee's grandmother taking her out for a morning walk.

name: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
summary_text: Dave is deaf, and Wally is blind. They witness a murder, but it was Dave who was looking at her, and Wally who was listening.

name: Robot Chicken
summary_text: Pop culture references fly thick and fast as stop-motion animation is featured in sketches lampooning everything from television movies to comic books.

name: The Love Witch
summary_text: A modern-day witch uses spells and magic to get men to fall in love with her, with deadly consequences.

name: Fantastic Four: Rise of the Silver Surfer
summary_text: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.

name: Greta
summary_text: A young woman befriends a lonely widow who's harboring a dark and deadly agenda toward her.

name: Gia
summary_text: The story of the life of Gia Carangi, a top fashion model from the late 1970s, from her meteoric rise to the forefront of the modeling industry, to her untimely death.

name: Passenger 57
summary_text: An airline security expert must take action when he finds himself trapped on a passenger jet when terrorists seize control of it.

name: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters
summary_text: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters, to find the mythical Golden Fleece, all the while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.

name: Ondine
summary_text: An Irish fisherman discovers a woman in his fishing net whom his precocious daughter believes to be a selkie.
